Number of conformant spatial data sets for Annex I that have conformant metadata
+documentType:metadata +(resourceType:dataset resourceType:series) +isAboveThreshold:true +inspireAnnex:i +inspireConformResource:true Check the metadata record using INSPIRE validator and check that the Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 report a conform resource.
Number of conformant spatial data sets for Annex II that have conformant metadata
+documentType:metadata +(resourceType:dataset resourceType:series) +isAboveThreshold:true +inspireAnnex:ii +inspireConformResource:true Check the metadata record using INSPIRE validator and check that the Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 report a conform resource.

+documentType:metadata +(resourceType:dataset resourceType:series) +isAboveThreshold:true +inspireAnnex:iii +inspireConformResource:true Check the metadata record using INSPIRE validator and check that the Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 report a conform resource.

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets with metadata for which a discovery service exists (count a dataset as many time as its INSPIRE themes)
daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: All records used to build the report are harvested, so all records are available through discovery service (ie. equivalent to DSv_Num).

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets for Annex I
daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: The value is based on the harvested records. It may be underestimated if the number of spatial data set does not have metadata or if error occurred during harvesting.

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets for Annex II
daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: The value is based on the harvested records. It may be underestimated if the number of spatial data set does not have metadata or if error occurred during harvesting.

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets for Annex III
daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: The value is based on the harvested records. It may be underestimated if the number of spatial data set does not have metadata or if error occurred during harvesting.

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets for all Annexes
Number of all services

daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: Using only harvesting records, it should be 1.

daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: Using only harvesting records, it should be 1.

daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: Using only harvesting records, it should be 1.

daobs:indicator.daobs:name: Number of spatial data sets that have metadata
daobs:indicator.daobs:comment: Same remark as DSv_Num.
